name: Late Work
description:
You're late to close the office. Your boss demands you to leave until 12:00 AM, or there will be consequences.

Commands:

  • Left Button Mouse: interacts with enviroment.
  • Key C: interacts with cellphone.
  • Key E: interacts with flashlight.
  • Key ESC (ESCAPE): Menu Pause.
  • Key WASD: walk.
  • Key SHIFT: run.
  • Mouse: player view.

Assets in repository's readme in github:

https://github.com/Gustavobb/FPE
